title: Mike Malloy 01-30-07
description:
Joe Trippi - political revolutionary and Media Consultant for Nova M Radio - will join us tonight for a chat about the future of Internet radio broadcasts and a peek at the 2008 elections.

As you remember, Joe revolutionized electoral politics in America with his forward-thinking management of Howard Dean?s 2004 presidential campaign, raising over $40 million in small donor contributions over the internet. 

And we&#039;ll check in with Congress&#039; efforts to stop Bush&#039;s escalation of the war in Iraq and coming unprovoked attack on Iran. Plus the minimum wage bill FINALLY gets a debate in the Senate. Oh yeah, and the Libby trial. And Cheney&#039;s NEWSWEEK interview. 

Join the Fun and Frivolity 800-989-1480!
